channel.title: Intro on CTF Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Intro on CTF Journal

item.title: 2020 Hello World
item.description: This is the first blog post of I hope many of my journey down CTFs and other types of learning. All are welcome to post here, just make a markdown and do so. Also I’m definitely ok with cross posting, if you want to post the same content here as your blog and put links back to your blog please do.
